description: Explore, Enjoy & Cherish - Rajasthan, the land of Rajputana Charm, Valour & Romance, with The Palace on Wheels. While experiencing the luxuries enjoyed by the Maharajas of yore do not forget to unfold the hidden mystical charm of Rajasthan. You can ask us for various programmes that would help you do so.
details: Accommodation in a Standard Air-Conditioned room
Transfers from railway station/airport to hotel
Travel in an air-conditioned car as per the itinerary
Intercity transfers and sightseeing tours as per the itinerary
